aboutPage.intro: Full Stack Developer with 2 years of experience in software development, working on building modern and scalable web applications. I actively participate in all stages of the development cycle, from data modeling and architecture definition to deployment and maintenance, always focusing on quality, performance, and user experience.
aboutPage.tech: I work mainly with JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, and Next.js, and in the last year I worked on large-scale projects in the Django ecosystem, developing robust back-end solutions and efficient front-end interfaces.
aboutPage.design: I have solid experience in UI/UX Design, working from visual and structural conception to implementation in front-end frameworks. One of my main achievements in this area was leading the rebranding of one of Brazil's largest scheduling platforms, combining design strategy, usability, and technical execution.
aboutPage.designEnthusiast: I'm also a design enthusiast, always exploring the intersection between aesthetics, functionality, and innovation.
aboutPage.project: Among my featured projects is the idealization and implementation of a virtual assistant for an online learning platform, developed with Django on the back-end and HTMX, Alpine.js, and Tailwind CSS on the front-end, contributing to a more fluid, interactive, and user-oriented experience.
aboutPage.approach: I constantly seek to create well-structured, scalable, and easy-to-evolve solutions, balancing technical vision, business understanding, and development best practices.
aboutPage.workAreas: Full Stack • Application Architecture • UI/UX • Web Development • Deploy & Maintenance
